languages.text: If the wearer has 70 AGI they are considered in half cover. If the wearer has 140 AGI they are considered in full cover instead. This effect is only active in combat!

traits.locale_text: If the wearer has 70 AGI they are considered in half cover. If the wearer has 140 AGI they are considered in full cover instead. This effect is only active in combat!

languages.text: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.
languages.original_text: If the wearer has 70 AGI they are considered in half cover. If the wearer has 140 AGI they are considered in full cover instead. This effect is only active in combat!

traits.locale_text: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead, if their Agility is more than 140.

While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.

While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.

languages.text: 戦闘中、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}が70を超えている場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半遮蔽物{/g}によって守られているとみなされ、140を超えている場合は完全遮蔽物によって守られているとみなされる。
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead, if their Agility is more than 140.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}が70を超えている場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半遮蔽物{/g}によって守られているとみなされ、140を超えている場合は完全遮蔽物によって守られているとみなされる。

languages.text: В бою считается, что персонаж находится за частичным {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}, если его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} больше 70, или за полным, если его Ловкость больше 140.
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.

traits.locale_text: В бою считается, что персонаж находится за частичным {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}, если его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} больше 70, или за полным, если его Ловкость больше 140.

В бою считается, что персонаж находится за частичным {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}, если его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} больше 70, или за полным, если его Ловкость больше 140.

В бою считается, что персонаж находится за частичным {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}, если его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} больше 70, или за полным, если его Ловкость больше 140.

languages.text: Während des Kampfes hat der Träger teilweise {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}, wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} höher als 70 ist. Ist seine Beweglichkeit höher als 140, hat er volle Deckung.
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.

traits.locale_text: Während des Kampfes hat der Träger teilweise {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}, wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} höher als 70 ist. Ist seine Beweglichkeit höher als 140, hat er volle Deckung.

languages.text: Giyen kişi çatışmadayken {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği 70'in üzerindeyse kısmi {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperle{/g}, Çeviklik niteliği 140'ın üzerindeyse tam siperle korunuyor kabul edilir.
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi çatışmadayken {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği 70'in üzerindeyse kısmi {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperle{/g}, Çeviklik niteliği 140'ın üzerindeyse tam siperle korunuyor kabul edilir.

languages.text: Durant le combat, le porteur est considéré comme bénéficiant d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture partielle{/g} si son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} est supérieure à 70, et d'une couverture totale si son Agilité est supérieure à 140.
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.

traits.locale_text: Durant le combat, le porteur est considéré comme bénéficiant d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture partielle{/g} si son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} est supérieure à 70, et d'une couverture totale si son Agilité est supérieure à 140.

languages.text: En combate, el portador se considera protegido por {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} parcial si su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} es superior a 70, y por cobertura total si su Agilidad es superior a 140.
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.

traits.locale_text: En combate, el portador se considera protegido por {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} parcial si su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} es superior a 70, y por cobertura total si su Agilidad es superior a 140.

languages.text: 战斗期间，如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}超过70点，则视为受半身{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}保护；如果装备者的敏捷超过140点，则视为受全身掩体保护。
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.

traits.locale_text: 战斗期间，如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}超过70点，则视为受半身{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}保护；如果装备者的敏捷超过140点，则视为受全身掩体保护。
